description.value:
You have learned how to create perpetual alchemical infusions that can provide a near-infinite supply of certain simple items.

You gain the ability to create two 1st-level alchemical items using @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Quick Alchemy]{Quick Alchemy} without spending a batch of infused reagents. The items you can select depend on your research field and must be in your formula book.

Choose two of the following formulas:

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Bestial Mutagen (Lesser)]{Bestial Mutagen (Lesser)},
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Cognitive Mutagen (Lesser)]{Cognitive Mutagen (Lesser)},
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Juggernaut Mutagen (Lesser)]{Juggernaut Mutagen (Lesser)},
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Quicksilver Mutagen (Lesser)]{Quicksilver Mutagen (Lesser)},
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Serene Mutagen (Lesser)]{Serene Mutagen (Lesser)}, or
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Silvertongue Mutagen (Lesser)]{Silvertongue Mutagen (Lesser)}
